item.title: About
item.description: This is me! Hi there My name is Bruno Anjos i’m 22 and i’m a Computer Science student, currently in my masters’ degree final year. I’m mostly interested in Computer Systems Architecture, Distributed Systems, Computer Networks and Security associated with all these topics. Feel free to hit me up. Contacts Email Github LinkedIn
